name: STE - Simple Text Editor
short_description:
STE is meant to be a simple text editor, as the Windows Notepad, but "on steroid", that's to say it has to be richer in functionalities than the other text editors.

At the moment, it's very poor. I need help in developing functionalities such as syntax highlighting (referred to many programming language syntaxes) and every logic thing one can think. So feel free to download the source, try and develop for yourself and, if you want, share your progresses with me and be inserted inside the "development team" and help me with the development of the application.
summary: A simple but full of functions text editor
